insert into search_info(name, cardid, sex, age, intime, xcg_bxb, xcg_zxbl, xcg_zx, xcg_dhbl, xcg_dh, xcg_lbbl, xcg_lb, xcg_ssxlbl, xcg_ssxl, xcg_sjxlbl, xcg_sjxl, xcg_hxb, xcg_xhdb, xcg_hxbyj, xcg_hxbtj, xcg_pjxh, xcg_pjxhnd, xcg_rbcsd, xcg_rbccv, xcg_xxb, xcg_xxbtj, xcg_xxbyj, xcg_xxbkd, xcg_xxbdxbl, yg_bmky, yg_bmkt, yg_eky, yg_ekt, yg_hxky, ncg_ndy, ncg_dhs, ncg_tt, ncg_yx, ncg_dbz, ncg_yxsy, ncg_bxb, ncg_ppt, ncg_bz, ncg_ph, ncg_wbdb, ncg_ys, ncg_tmd, ncg_hxbdl, ncg_bxbdl, ncg_gx, ncg_yljj, ncg_spxb, sgn_tsqg, sgn_ns, sgn_jg, sgn_nsuan, sgn_ppt, sgn_xqg, sgn_nsjg, xz_dgc, xz_gysz, xz_gmd, xz_dmd, nxl_nxmcd, nxl_hh, nxl_xwcd, nxl_nxmsj, nxl_bzh, nxl_nxmbz, nxl_ejt, nxl_xwjjw, hbv_dna, xt_kf, xt_ch, xt_jmcd) values
(#{entity.name}, #{entity.cardid}, #{entity.sex}, #{entity.age}, #{entity.intime}, #{entity.xcgBxb}, #{entity.xcgZxbl}, #{entity.xcgZx}, #{entity.xcgDhbl}, #{entity.xcgDh}, #{entity.xcgLbbl}, #{entity.xcgLb}, #{entity.xcgSsxlbl}, #{entity.xcgSsxl}, #{entity.xcgSjxlbl}, #{entity.xcgSjxl}, #{entity.xcgHxb}, #{entity.xcgXhdb}, #{entity.xcgHxbyj}, #{entity.xcgHxbtj}, #{entity.xcgPjxh}, #{entity.xcgPjxhnd}, #{entity.xcgRbcsd}, #{entity.xcgRbccv}, #{entity.xcgXxb}, #{entity.xcgXxbtj}, #{entity.xcgXxbyj}, #{entity.xcgXxbkd}, #{entity.xcgXxbdxbl}, #{entity.ygBmky}, #{entity.ygBmkt}, #{entity.ygEky}, #{entity.ygEkt}, #{entity.ygHxky}, #{entity.ncgNdy}, #{entity.ncgDhs}, #{entity.ncgTt}, #{entity.ncgYx}, #{entity.ncgDbz}, #{entity.ncgYxsy}, #{entity.ncgBxb}, #{entity.ncgPpt}, #{entity.ncgBz}, #{entity.ncgPh}, #{entity.ncgWbdb}, #{entity.ncgYs}, #{entity.ncgTmd}, #{entity.ncgHxbdl}, #{entity.ncgBxbdl}, #{entity.ncgGx}, #{entity.ncgYljj}, #{entity.ncgSpxb}, #{entity.sgnTsqg}, #{entity.sgnNs}, #{entity.sgnJg}, #{entity.sgnNsuan}, #{entity.sgnPpt}, #{entity.sgnXqg}, #{entity.sgnNsjg}, #{entity.xzDgc}, #{entity.xzGysz}, #{entity.xzGmd}, #{entity.xzDmd}, #{entity.nxlNxmcd}, #{entity.nxlHh}, #{entity.nxlXwcd}, #{entity.nxlNxmsj}, #{entity.nxlBzh}, #{entity.nxlNxmbz}, #{entity.nxlEjt}, #{entity.nxlXwjjw}, #{entity.hbvDna}, #{entity.xtKf}, #{entity.xtCh}, #{entity.xtJmcd})

insert into search_info_deal(name, cardid,idnumber, sex, age, intime, xcg_bxb, xcg_zxbl, xcg_zx, xcg_dhbl, xcg_dh, xcg_lbbl, xcg_lb, xcg_ssxlbl, xcg_ssxl, xcg_sjxlbl, xcg_sjxl, xcg_hxb, xcg_xhdb, xcg_hxbyj, xcg_hxbtj, xcg_pjxh, xcg_pjxhnd, xcg_rbcsd, xcg_rbccv, xcg_xxb, xcg_xxbtj, xcg_xxbyj, xcg_xxbkd, xcg_xxbdxbl, yg_bmky, yg_bmkt, yg_eky, yg_ekt, yg_hxky, ncg_ndy, ncg_dhs, ncg_tt, ncg_yx, ncg_dbz, ncg_yxsy, ncg_bxb, ncg_ppt, ncg_bz, ncg_ph, ncg_wbdb, ncg_ys, ncg_tmd, ncg_hxbdl, ncg_bxbdl, ncg_gx, ncg_yljj, ncg_spxb, sgn_tsqg, sgn_ns, sgn_jg, sgn_nsuan, sgn_ppt, sgn_xqg, sgn_nsjg, xz_dgc, xz_gysz, xz_gmd, xz_dmd, nxl_nxmcd, nxl_hh, nxl_xwcd, nxl_nxmsj, nxl_bzh, nxl_nxmbz, nxl_ejt, nxl_xwjjw, hbv_dna, xt_kf, xt_ch, xt_jmcd) values

mapper.select: SELECT name, cardid,sex,age,MAX(intime) as intime FROM search_info GROUP BY cardid,name,sex,age ORDER BY name ,age
